price: Artık, Allah’ın size verdiği rızıktan helâl ve temiz olarak yiyin, eğer (gerçekten) yalnız Allah'a ibadet ediyorsanız, onun nimetine şükredin.
arabic: فَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَٱشۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ إِيَّاهُ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ush'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi in kuntum iyyāhu taʿbudūna
